import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get location IDs for filter sets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/ids/for/filtersets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Evaluates specified filter sets against locations and returns the IDs of locations that match each filter set. This is useful for determining which locations would be affected by filter-based rules or workflows.

**Use Cases:**
- Preview which locations match a filter set before applying it
- Validate filter set configurations
- Build dynamic location lists based on filter criteria

**Performance Considerations:**
- Processing many filter sets or locations can be resource-intensive
- Use `OnlyReturnFirstMatch` when you only need to know if any locations match
- Use `IdsToProcess` to limit evaluation to specific locations

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication","example":"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for retrieving entity IDs belonging to specific filter sets.","properties":{"FilterSetIds":{"type":"array","description":"List of filter set identifiers to evaluate.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"IdsToProcess":{"type":"array","description":"Optional subset of entity IDs to restrict the evaluation to.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"IgnoreFilterSetsWithNoConditions":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, filter sets without conditions are skipped.","default":false},"OnlyReturnFirstMatch":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, stops after the first matching filter set.","default":false}},"title":"GetIdsForFilterSetRequest"},"example":{"FilterSetIds":["aaa32d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80","bbb32d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80"],"IdsToProcess":[],"IgnoreFilterSetsWithNoConditions":true,"OnlyReturnFirstMatch":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
